```{r}
log_like <- function(mu){
  70*log(mu) + 30*log(1-mu)
}

mu <- seq(0,1, 0.1)

plot(mu, log_like(mu), type="l", xlab="", ylab="", main="", col="red", lwd=2, xaxt="n")

abline(v=0.7)

axis(1,mu,mu)
```


```{r}
library(rstan)
#stanファイルを読み込む
stanmodel <- stan_model("binomial.stan")

paralist <- list(N=100, m=70, a=1, b=1)
#パラメータはリストで渡す
fit <- sampling(stanmodel, data=paralist)
```


```{r}
result <- rstan::extract(fit)
mean(result$mu)
hist(result$mu, freq=F, main="", xlab="", ylab="")
lines(density(result$mu), col="red")
```
